articles.title: Educational Achievements of DPRK for This Year
articles.content:
Educational Achievements of DPRK for This Year
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made in the educational work of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea this year.
					 The universal 12-year compulsory education has been enforced on an overall scale and more than 90 technical senior middle schools emerged to teach technical subjects for different sectors of national economy in keeping with the economic and geological specific features of relevant regions. Hundreds of valuable scientific research achievements conducive to putting education on a modern and IT basis were made.
					
					 About 750 school-buildings across the country were erected or refurnished and thus 4,400 odd classrooms newly appeared and at least 25,500 classrooms or laboratories were refurnished.
					
					 The educational system of the country has been further improved in line with the requirements of the new century.
					
					 At all universities school systems, departments, courses and chairs were rearranged and the work for developing the continuous high educational system has been conducted.
					
					 The Education Commission made up more than 130 kinds of multimedia programs for supporting the teaching to help all the schools use them thorough state-run network from the new school year. And it provided all the junior and senior middle schools with necessary apparatuses for experiment and practice.
					
					 Amid a high-pitched drive for giving priority to education, radical leaps were made in improving the educational conditions and circumstances.

articles.title: Sea Blockade Will Be Regarded as Declaration of War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sea Blockade Will Be Regarded as Declaration of War: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson, White House National Security Adviser McMaster, U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Haley and anti-DPRK hard-liners in the Congress are crying out for imposing sea blockade upon the DPRK. And the U.S. State Department seeks to modify such phrases as "consent of flag states" and "reasonable grounds" in the UN "sanctions resolution" 2375 into "by use of all necessary measures" in a bid to secure legal justification for sea blockade.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 The U.S. scenario for sea blockade against the DPRK can never be tolerated as it is just a wanton violation of its sovereignty and dignity.
					
					 Not content with kicking up the largest-ever nuclear war drills at seas and in the air after bringing huge strategic assets to the vicinity of the Korean peninsula, the U.S. is now talking about sea blockade against the DPRK. This is just a hideous provocation pushing the situation to an "uncontrollable catastrophe" and the brink of war.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. is just the thrice-cursed criminal wholly to blame for worsening the situation on the Korean peninsula and wrecking global peace and security and that the Trump cult deserves worldwide criticism for its sanctions racket to stifle the DPRK, a heinous crime.
					
					 The DPRK will regard the U.S. and its vassal forces' project for sea blockade against it as wanton infringement on its sacred sovereignty and dignity and another open declaration of war, and will never remain passive.
					
					 The hostile forces should bear in mind that if they show a slightest sign of putting the blockade project into practice, a merciless countermeasure will be taken by the DPRK immediately.

articles.title: Stop to North-Targeted Air Drill Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to North-Targeted Air Drill Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The North Chungchong Provincial Anti-Trump, Anti-U.S. Struggle Headquarters of south Korea held a press conference on Dec. 6 in demand of halt to the north-targeted U.S.-south joint air drill and dissolution of the special task brigade, according to the south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 Speakers there said the extremely belligerent brigade specially tasked with "eliminating the supreme leadership of the north" should be dissolved immediately.
					
					 A statement released at the conference urged the U.S. and the south Korea regime to stop the aggressive air drill and dismantle the brigade.
					
					 It warned that the present ruling forces of south Korea will meet the miserable end like Park Geun Hye if they persist in playing the role of Trump's stooge.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Increases Military Budget
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Increases Military Budget
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The "National Assembly" of south Korea reportedly passed a bill on military budget for next year.
					 The budget increased by 7 percent, compared with that of this year and 40.4 billion won were added to the original amount during the deliberation at the "Assembly."
					
					 The puppet regime of south Korea is going to lavish the money on developing the "triad strike system" designed for a preemptive attack on the north.
					
					 The project includes development of spy satellites, introduction of ballistic missile early warning radar, promotion of the capacity of medium-range missile and Patriot missiles and import of F-35A, subs and copters for naval operation.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Air Drill under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Air Drill under Fire
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, released a statement on Dec. 6 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint air drill.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime's unprecedented war racket aimed at a preemptive attack for "totally destroying" the north is pushing the acute situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war, the statement said.
					
					 Branding the drill as a grave military provocation and an unpardonable thrice-cursed crime to trample down the desire of all Koreans aspiring after peace, security and national reunification and plunge the Korean peninsula into a nuclear holocaust, it went on to say:
					
					 It clearly shows that the U.S. and the south Korean war maniacs are, indeed, wreckers of peace and provokers of a nuclear war.
					
					 The statement blamed the south Korean regime for following in the footsteps of the former sycophancy regime hell-bent on kowtowing to the U.S. and escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north and for unhesitatingly joining the U.S. in its military provocation, the height of hostile acts against the DPRK.
					
					 The association will tangibly contribute to the anti-U.S. struggle of all Koreans to resolutely foil the U.S. sanctions and military moves to stifle the DPRK, protect peace of the homeland and usher in the new era of independent reunification by dint of the great unit of the nation under the banner of the Korean nation itself, it stated.

articles.title: Application of Tuition Waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded in Japan
articles.content:
Application of Tuition Waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded in Japan
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A Friday action demanding the application of tuition waiver program to Korean schools in Japan was staged in Tokyo on Dec. 1.
					 It was attended by students of the Korean University and Korean high schools, Koreans in Japan and Japanese personages.
					
					 Speakers there expressed their will to carry on their struggle of solidarity with Koreans in Japan, Japanese personages and south Koreans to secure the rights to education of the students of Korean schools in the next year, too.
					
					 That day the Citizens' Meeting for Protecting Campus and Children of south Korea handed a written request to a related official of the Japan Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology in demand of application of the tuition waiver program to the Korean schools.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Finland
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Helsinki, Finland on December 2.
					 Pekka Kotkasaari, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events including remembrance meeting, book and photo exhibition and film show to praise the noble revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in S. Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in S. Africa
Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- The Committee of the South African Communist Party for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed on December 2.
					Blade Nzimande, general secretary of the C.C., South African Communist Party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					The committee decided to organize political and cultural events in praise of leader Kim Jong Il's exploits for the Korean revolution and the global cause of independence on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Meetings for remembering leader Kim Jong Il were held in Benin, Indonesia and Italy from Nov. 21 to Dec. 3 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of his demise.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Beninese National Committee for Remembering General Kim Jong Il who is chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that leader Kim Jong Il further developed the Juche idea, the Songun idea with his distinguished ideo-theoretical wisdom and made every line and policy reflect the desire and demand of the popular masses.
					
					 Harn Sinuraya, manager of the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia, said that HE Kim Jong Il wisely led the struggle of the progressive people for independence and accelerated the cause of global independence through his energetic external activities.
					
					 Miriam Pelegrini Peri, chairwoman of the Italian Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il, said that he is the leader of people as he shaped the politics of love for the people with the noble idea of believing in them as in Heaven.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of KFA Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of KFA Held
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) took place in Tarragona of Spain on Nov. 18.
					 Present there were personages of the KFA headquarters and representatives of its branches in Britain, Denmark, Malta, etc.
					
					 Speakers said that the nuclear oppression era when the U.S. threatened the world with nukes has come to an end as the Democratic People's Republic of Korea possessed the powerful nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Expressing the conviction in the victory of the socialist cause, they stressed the need to fully support the self-defensive measures of the DPRK for protecting the sovereignty of the country and the nation's right to existence and peace and security of the Korean peninsula and intensify the solidarity activities with the Korean people pushing ahead with the building of a socialist powerful nation.

articles.title: Foreigners Hail DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
Foreigners Hail DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, December 10 (KCNA) -- Personages of Mexico and Ukraine released statements on Nov. 29 congratulating the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on its successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said:
					
					 All members of my party warmly congratulate the Korean people on their successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					
					 The Korean people strenuously struggle under the wise guidance of Comrade Kim Jong Un, not surrendering to the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces' hideous sanctions and pressure.
					
					 This instills great confidence and courage into the progressive people aspiring after justice and peace, dealing a telling blow at the imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices and moves for provoking a war.
					
					 The chairperson of the Dnepropetrovsk Branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said:
					
					 We are pleased that the Korean people have possessed stronger nuclear deterrent, foiling all challenges of the hostile forces.
					
					 Now that the DPRK has ranked itself among the advanced nuclear powers, peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia can be preserved.
					
					 We once again warmly congratulate the Korean people on their success and hope that they would dynamically advance along the road indicated by Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
